title: [Old Manor, Closet]
description: Stumbling blindly into near pitch blackness, you find yourself in a tiny closet. As your eyes adjust to the darkness, you notice a thin beam of moonlight shining through the door, centering on some boards that comprise the remains of the closet floor.

Stumbling blindly into near pitch blackness, you find yourself in a tiny closet. As your eyes adjust to the darkness, you notice a thin beam of light shining through the door, centering on some boards that comprise the remains of the closet floor.
